title: UK sanctions Russian spies for malicious activity
description: Three Russian intelligence units and 18 officers have been sanctioned, the Foreign Office says.
content:
A number of Russian spies have been sanctioned for conducting a "sustained campaign of malicious cyber activity" including in the UK, the Foreign Office has said.

title: UK broadcasters 'need urgent boost from YouTube'
description: The UK's system of public service broadcasting is "under serious threat", media regulator Ofcom says.

title: UK eases Israel travel advice as evacuation effort winds down
description: The sixth and final scheduled evacuation flight organised by the government is set to depart on Sunday.
content:
The government has loosened its travel advice for Israel, as a final evacuation flight for British nationals is set to depart from Tel Aviv on Sunday.

title: UK Scientists Achieve First Commercial Tritium Production
description:
